hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: I saw no one cooking food like Safiyyah. She cooked food for the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and sent it. I became angry and broke the vessel. I then asked: Messenger of Allah, what is the atonement for what I have done? He replied: A vessel like (this) vessel and food like (this) food

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ أَفْسَدَ شَيْئًا يَغْرَمُ مِثْلَهُ
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Damages Something Is Liable To Replace It With Something Similar
